headline: Underground Line Replacement Enhances Service Reliability for JCP&L's Barrier Island Customers
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), is replacing an underwater, high-voltage power line to enhance service reliability to New Jersey's barrier islands. The $12.5 million project is expected to be completed in mid-December.
